title: Wordpress Users Disclosure
content:
Information
Using REST API, we can see all the WordPress users/author with some of their information.
Step to Reproduce
You can get user info by entering below url in your browser:
https://nextcloud.com/wp-json/wp/v2/users
Reference: #356047
Impact
Authors : LTR , LTREditor can be created scenario of doing bruteforce attacks to this users.
steps: Navigate to the WordPress REST API endpoint for users in a browser: https://nextcloud.com/wp-json/wp/v2/users
Observe the list of WordPress users and their associated information returned by the API
vuln_description: The WordPress REST API endpoint '/wp-json/wp/v2/users' is exposed, allowing unauthenticated access to user information such as usernames and roles. This information disclosure can facilitate brute force attacks against the exposed user accounts.
reason: This vulnerability involves a single, straightforward step to access a well-documented WordPress REST API endpoint. There are no complex interactions, state manipulations, or novel logic required to exploit this issue.
